interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Dead Sea Mud Soap,125gr, Minerals & Salt Spa Skincare for Multi Skin Disorders Natural Treatment for Face & All Body, Natural Beauty Care, All Skin types, Perfect for Oily Skin Treatment, Smooth Face & Body Within 5-10 Min Review Date: 2021/10/31 Store: MINERALS MINERALS Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Brand': 'MINERALS MINERALS', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.39 x 1.97 x 0.98 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MS-05', 'UPC': '787269003378'} Review Text: This soap may be better for oily skin as it really cleans everything off, it left my skin so clean it was literally squeaking. I have dry skin and didn't like the overall effect. But my husband has very oily skin and he thinks it is one of the best bars of soap he has ever used. It really got his skin clean without making it feel dry.

This soap doesn't suds up to much, it is almost like washing with an ultra fine pumice stone that really gets the skin clean. This would be a great soap to use on very dirty hands. Or as a mild exfoliator in the shower.

I gave it 5 stars for its superior cleaning ability, its unique look, and my spouses very high recommendation. Review Title: Squeaky clean skin without feeling dried out Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Zen Rituals Pure Minerals Sea Bath Salts Set for Relaxation with Premium Essential Oils Aromatherapy Lavender, Tea Tree and Epsom Eucalyptus, Bundle Pack of 3 Bottles Zen Rituals {'Brand': 'Zen Rituals', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Tea Tree', 'Product Benefits': 'Relaxation,Aromatherapy', 'Unit Count': '105.6 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Product Dimensions': '6.79 x 8.98 x 2.99 inches; 7.12 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SEASETLAVTEATREAEUCALYPT', 'UPC': '791109148211', 'Manufacturer': 'Zen Rituals Product'} I wish all bath salts were like these. They dissolve fast and have a great aromatherapy effect in a hot tub. Plus they actually feel beneficial on my skin. Love them! I want more! Recieved as a gift, but LOVE the bath salts Butterfly Nail Art Decals Water Transfer Stickers, 22 Sheets Butterfly Nail Sticker DIY Nail Decals, 2 Set Butterfly Nail Glitter Holographic Stickers Reflected Butterfly Designs for Nails Supply B bangcool {'Surface Recommendation nail': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Shape Irregular': '', 'Brand': 'B bangcool', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Pattern': 'Insects', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} This set is just mammoth...haha Perfect for anyone who is really into butterflies. And the sticky glue on the back of the butterflies is good enough that they can be used on more then just finger/toe nails, like cell phones, school books, lunch boxes, and places you might rather they didn't start showing up.

The collection is widely varied with silver, gold, multi colored, and different sizes and shapes, they are all relatively small to tiny, and there are no tweezers included, not that most folks don't have plenty of pairs lying around...

The butterfly stick on nail art is an excellent value and an easy 5 stars. A Flutter of Butterflies UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold OVLUX {'Brand': 'OVLUX', 'Special Feature': 'Energy Efficient', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Connectivity Technology': 'USB', 'Package Dimensions': '9.4 x 8.3 x 4.3 inches; 1.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '765453999881'} What I like best is this is very easy to setup and use. The timer buttons turn it on and start the timer, press again and time is extended. The buttons are easy to press as well so I was able to get at them with wet nails. One thing that surprised me was the top and bottom come apart and are only lightly held together with magnets. I do wish they stayed together a little tighter, but they snap together easily so in the end its no big deal...I guess. This is my first at home nail dryer and I would say this drys about as fast as dryers at good nail salons, and its small enough that it stores in a drawer easily. super easy to use Vertra Black Lava Body Scrub - Exfoliating & detoxing body scrub with volcanic ash and charcoal, 3.4 Oz, purifying & softening with coconut and avocado oil Vertra {'Brand': 'Vertra', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Detox,Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 1.75 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '889297004621'} This isn't that scrub that you use every single day, its more for those occasional deep cleanings, and exfoliating. Or just for a good at home spa treatment. The size of the jar, and the amount of product is fairly small but it doesn't take much to get a good facial cleansing. To me, it smells very much like a Pina Coloda, but not over powering just a nice fresh scent.

The scrub itself is has a medium sized grit, and its feels fairly "sharp" against the skin. Also, this isn't great for rubbing on and then taking a long soak in a tub, it turns the water black. I was worried it would stain my towels, the floor, tub something, but it didn't.

This scrub is fairly specialized and is one of those love it or hate it things. I gave it 5 stars because the quality is excellent, the ingredients are top notch, and it has a pleasant smell. But it has to be tried before you'll know if its right for you. Pina Colada-ish smell, Very Gritty, Good Scrub Handmade Natural Sandalwood Hair Comb Anti-static Natural Logs Sandalwood Comb Protect Hair Untie Knotted Hair Vintage Design Comb (B) JAVENPROLIU ['Natural anti-static sandalwood comb can promote blood circulation on the head and prevent hair from drying out and breaking. Protect your hair and scalp.It is a very good choice whether you use it yourself or give it to family and friends. High-quality combs are not only daily necessities, but also works of art. Our combs are made of complete sandalwood logs through cutting, shaping, carving patterns, grinding, polishing and other processes. The texture of each comb is unique. 100% handmade natural sandalwood comb, long-term use can prevent hair fall and avoid scalp injury, and solve the trouble of hair knotting when combing. Our comb is ultra-fine polishing technology, round and smooth teeth effectively prevent hair from breaking when combing, and easily comb the tangled hair. Long-term use promotes blood circulation in the head and really effectively maintains your hair health. Natural sandalwood contains a large number of small oxygen particles that are beneficial to hair, so frizzy hair becomes soft and smooth. Sandalwood effectively prevents hair static electricity (static electricity will cause hair to dry and accelerate the loss of water molecules in the hair), and prevent static electricity from bringing to the hair hurt. Our combs are solid and durable for a hundred years without decay. Thousands of manual and complex polishing have created the delicate texture of China Resources, which is made according to the standards of art to ensure the texture. Package 1 pcs Sandalwood comb'] {'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 3.74 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '735192319264', 'Manufacturer': 'JAVENPROLIU'} This comb is nicely made with a smooth finish, the etching/carving on the handle is a beautiful intricate design and the wood bristles are gentle on my scalp especially compared to plastic combs. The comb I received has a very light sandalwood smell to it. Wood combs are know for being gentle on the scalp and hair and don't produce any static electricity. This is my first sandalwood comb and I am surprised how gentle it feels on my scalp. This comb is an easy 5 stars. I have dry skin and didn't like the overall effect. But my husband has very oily skin and he thinks it is one of the best bars of soap he has ever used. It really got his skin clean without making it feel dry.

This soap doesn't suds up to much, it is almost like washing with an ultra fine pumice stone that really gets the skin clean. This would be a great soap to use on very dirty hands. Or as a mild exfoliator in the shower.

I gave it 5 stars for its superior cleaning ability, its unique look, and my spouses very high recommendation. Squeaky clean skin without feeling dried out
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for Relaxation and Wellness Products:** The user maintains a strong focus on relaxation and wellness items, particularly through sensory experiences that promote tranquility and self-care, now further extending their interest to skincare products that cater to various skin types.

- **Positive Experience with Sensory Products:** They continue to appreciate calming scents such as lavender and sandalwood, favoring products that enhance relaxation while delivering skincare benefits, emphasizing the effectiveness of natural materials.

- **Commitment to Quality and Effectiveness:** The user values high-quality, effective products, demonstrating a dedication to wellness and an appreciation for handmade artistry across personal care items, including specialized soaps.

- **Desire for Repeat Purchases and Recommendations:** Their experiences indicate a willingness to repurchase and recommend similar effective products, reinforcing strong brand loyalty in wellness and personal care categories.

- **Enjoyment of Gifted and Decorative Items:** They appreciate receiving wellness products as gifts, which further enhance positive associations with relaxation. Their growing enthusiasm for artistic and decorative elements highlights their desire to meld self-expression with wellness.

- **Interest in Targeted Skin Solutions:** The user’s recent purchase of a specialized skincare product illustrates a willingness to explore effective solutions tailored to different skin conditions, indicating an understanding of the interplay between product functionality and personal skincare needs.

Overall, the profile reflects a consistent commitment to quality relaxation and personal care products while embracing artistry and creativity in their wellness journey.
